title: Where can I download the PROJECT Ashe login screen music?
body:
I really enjoy it and would like to add it to my collection of League soundtracks.

Also, if there's a way for me to still get Vi's login theme, I'd appreciate a link for that too.

replies.body: You can find/download most of our login songs on our [soundcloud](https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends) page. :)
what about Project: Ashe in-game dance? I recall another thread a few days ago asking for a full length version, what happened with that?

We unfortunately don't have a full length version. I only composed the small bit that you hear in-game. I personally would love to make a full-length track of it but don't have the time at the moment. :/

Psst. When the next album comes out it's a must.

No alternatives accepted :P
I think they're all on youtube on the official league channel.
